title: 454. Should Traffic Lights Be Abolished?
description: Americans are so accustomed to the standard intersection that we rarely consider how dangerous it can be — as well as costly, time-wasting, and polluting. Is it time to embrace the lowly, lovely roundabout?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
